headline: Why Corning (GLW) Stock Is Up Today
summary: Shares of glass and electronic component manufacturer Corning (NYSE:GLW) jumped 2.9% in the morning session after UBS upgraded the stock from Neutral to Buy, pointing to growth potential from artificial intelligence.

headline: Best Momentum Stock to Buy for September 18th
summary: ATEYY, GLW and VEON made it to the Zacks Rank #1 (Strong Buy) momentum stocks list on September 18, 2025.

headline: Should You Reassess Corning After Its Shares Surge 17% in a Month?
summary: Thinking about what to do with your Corning shares? Or maybe you are considering jumping in after seeing recent headlines and impressive returns. Let’s cut through the noise and figure out what’s really driving this stock, so you can make smart decisions whether you are holding strong, thinking about cashing out, or ready to join the rally. Corning’s stock has been on quite a ride, and it is not just a blip. Over the past week, the shares are up 2.6%. If you zoom out over the last month, it...
